name: WMP EuroCom AG
goal:
WMP Eurocom is a leading strategic communications consultancy for German corporate clients and international governments. With more than 30 consultants and offices in Berlin, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Munich and Brussels WMP Eurocom has specialized in strategic communication solutions for restructuring and change processes as well as crisis management and in mission-critical situations for governments.
Our consultants advise companies and organizations on the growing complexity of the European decision-making structure and legislative procedures. They assist our clients on how political, social and economic developments can impact their business model and how to strategically position in this context. This includes support in credibly promoting legitimate interests by engaging with policy makers, regulators and the public.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU-Initiativen und Strategien im Bereich Landwirtschaft, Energie, Klimaschutz etc.
EU-Gesetzgebungsvorhaben
